CLASS_CHANGED_TO_CANCELED.description: The state of a subscribed class has changed from CLASS to CANCELED

CLASS_CHANGED_TO_INFO.description: The state of a subscribed class has changed from CLASS to INFO

CANCELED_CHANGED_TO_INFO.description: The state of a subscribed class has changed from CANCELED to INFO

CANCELED_CHANGED_TO_CLASS.description: The state of a subscribed class has changed from CANCELED to CLASS

INFO_CHANGED_TO_CLASS.description: The state of a subscribed class has changed from INFO to CLASS

INFO_CHANGED_TO_CANCELED.description: The state of a subscribed class has changed from INFO to CANCELED

CUSTOM_NOTIFICATION.description: A custom notification which was provided by an admin

HOLIDAY_NOTICE.description: Something relevant which is relevant to the timetable

ARTICLE_ALERT.description: A new post provided in the app has been released
